price: 70.Kaadu Nabiyow ama koros derre kot cabtaah koo dirabbossaamih sabbatah keenih marookitinaay, usun koh kah malsan uma malah sabbatah alil kak ceyta num makkin, diggah Yalli koo qoklelek (catelek).
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
